means: （道德败坏的人或行为）极邪恶的，极可耻的

sentence.Network_en: Her life has been per-manently blighted by his heinous crime.
sentence.Network_cn: 他犯下的滔天罪行给她的生活蒙上了永久的阴影。

sentence.Network_en: They admitted to the most heinous crimes.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们承认了极其恶劣的罪行.

sentence.Network_en: They are capable of the most heinous acts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们能做出最邪恶的事情。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... hedonist 享乐主义者>禁欲者 heinous 可憎的>值得赞美的 hie 匆忙>游手好闲.
英语专业八级核心词汇_普特英语听力 ... haven n 港口避难所 heinous adj 可憎的极恶的 heresy n 异端异教.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... pulchritudinous 美丽的 heinous 可憎的，十恶不赦的 vertiginous 令人眩晕的.
英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... haughty 高傲的 heinous 憎恨的 hostile 故意的.

list.abs: His brother is a heinous boy ., 他弟弟是个讨厌的孩子.
They admitted to the most heinous crimes ., 他们承认了极其恶劣的罪行.
Sudan has condemned killings as a heinous crime ., 苏丹谴责这次杀戮是可憎的罪行.
GOSSIP 1.3 ... you're heinous.|你太可恶了 Which is probablywhy you called.|这应该是你给我打电话的原因.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French haineus, from hair 'to hate', of Germanic origin

entry.tran: 十恶不赦的;令人发指的
entry.def: If you describe something such as a crime as heinous, you mean that it is extremely evil or horrible.

example.ex: Her life has been permanently blighted by his heinous crime...
example.tran: 他犯下的滔天罪行给她的生活蒙上了永久的阴影。

example.ex: They are capable of the most heinous acts.
example.tran: 他们能做出最邪恶的事情。

sentences.sentence: "no excess was too monstrous for them to commit"

auth_sentence.content: To refuse a stranger...food and shelter is a heinous crime.
auth_sentence.res_content: To refuse a stranger...food and shelter is a heinous crime.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To refuse a stranger...food and shelter is a heinous crime.

auth_sentence.content: They utterly refute the suppositions posited in this heinous article.
auth_sentence.res_content: They utterly refute the suppositions posited in this heinous article.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They utterly refute the suppositions posited in this heinous article.

auth_sentence.content: Why did these kids commit this heinous crime?
